altername_name: Phantasy Star II Text Adventure Volume 1: Eusis's Adventure
name: Phantasy Star II Text Adventure Volume 1: Yushis's Adventure
overview: The first half of the game takes place in the winter of AW 1274, about 10 years before the events of Phantasy Star II. The second half takes place 8 years onward. Rolf (Yūshisu or Eusis) is a government agent working out of the town of Paseo on Motavia, and the main character of Phantasy Star II. This text adventure describes Rolf's childhood as a young and talented, but conceited sword prodigy, detailing his rescue of a childhood friend, eventually leading up to his induction as an agent in duty of the government.
